ee eliyata ena nadaya nawatha mayikrafonayatama yanawa…namuth, oonawata wada wishala shabdayak spikara haraha pamina, eya mayikrafonayata nawatha giyahoth, eya nawatha, nawathath rawumata, rawumata yamin “pudu lamak” sidu karamin, ee sidu karana sama mohothakama thawa, thawath adhika lesa shabdaya wadi karanawa..kawuru hari eeka nathara nokaloth, “prathiposhanaya” mangin shabda wikashana paddhathiya winasha karawi….

winadiya yanakota maha jala kandak mulu kussiyama yata karagena giya.apith ithin iwilla paththakata dala udalu, manna, kadu, polu aragena wathura ayin karana wadeta bassa.kunu wechcha kama kaliyi,nahaya thiyagena inna bari pal wathurayi ekka thamayi mage mulu irida dawasama gewila giye.manejar lokkata kiwuwama uu nikan awith balala yanna giya,rata wadakarana ara lesbiyan manejar anti para awitha thamayi plambar mama kenek genath wade goda dala dunne.
oya mari karala dan kochchara kalda?
eekata thel chuttak dala, thel tika rath weddi aba tikak danna.
ee kisima kenekuta wijja balayen yuthu puduma anduma penune naha.

me athara paudgalika aayathanawala saha niweswala da mema kalaya thula jathika dhajaya osawa thabana lesa paudgalika anshaye wyawasayakayingen saha mahajanathawagen rajya paripalana ha swadesha katayuthu amathyanshaya illimak karayi.

bauddhayan anyagam walata harawa ganima saha rate siduwana hada kakiyawana balapachara saha manushya ghathana walakwa ganima sandaha ‘gamin gamata daham sisila sadaham charikawa’ namin wada satahan malawak kaluthara pradeshiya uthura shasanarakshaka mandalaya mangin aarambha kara thibe.ema pradeshiya shasanarakshaka mandala bala pradeshaye wiharadhipathin wahanse sahabhagi karawa ganimin labana (2011) wasare wesak pun poda dakwa me wyapruthiya pawathwe.2011 sambuddha jayanthiya aramunu karagena sanwidhana kara athi gamin gamata daham sisila wada satahan malawe palamu wanna pasugiyada pothupitiya pujarama wiharadhipathi kaluthara pradeshiya (uthura) shasanarakshaka mandalaye sabhapathi baddegama sumana himiyan ge sanwidhayakathwayen ema wiharasthanaye di pawathwuna athara ehidi mawarale bhaddiya swamin wahanse wisin meheya wu sanwadashili daham hamuwak da pawathwini.samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalaye lekhakadhikari molligoda wajrakoth wiharasthanadhipathi gonaduwe gunananda himi saha kaluthara pradeshiya lekam sirisoma lokuwithana mahatha mehidi katha kala athara bauddha katayuthu komasaris chandraprema gamage, kaluthara sahakara pradeshiya lekam chathura malraj saha kaluthara pradeshiya bauddha katayuthu samayojaka sanath silwa mahathwaru da me awasthawata sahabhagi wuha.

obe pramartha ishta kara ganimata ahinsaka daruwange lama kalaya balahathkarayen labaganima lama apacharayak bawayi mage nam hangima.
